title: KFC 2 with Lauren Ash and Christy Oxborrow
itunes:title: KFC 2 with Lauren Ash and Christy Oxborrow
description:
Lauren Ash and Christy Oxborrow (True Crimes and Cocktails) join the 'boys to talk cold weather, shameful snacks, and KFC. Plus, another edition of Jingle All The Whey.


Sources for this week's intro:

https://www.pritzkermilitary.org/whats_on/pritzker-military-presents/glenna-whitley-stolen-valor

http://www.jameswebb.com/articles/military-and-veterans/the-medias-war-on-vietnam-vets

https://gothamist.com/arts-entertainment/wedding-crashers-fake-purple-hearts-inspire-bill

https://www.biography.com/business-figure/colonel-harland-sanders

https://global.kfc.com/our-heritage/


Want more Doughboys? Check out our Patreon!: https://patreon.com/doughboys
